docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Aug. 15 -Secretary of State Christian A. Herter is receiving an intensive education in Latin-American issues and psychology in the American foreign ministers' conference here. The fact is significant for the immediate future of inter-American relations.
